title: What should be the greetings if we want to greet someone from 10:00 am to 04:00 am? - Quora

response.answer_text: 10:00 am to noon is morning. 12:00 noon to 4:00 pm is afternoon. 5:00 to 8:00 pm is evening. 8:00 pm to 12:00 midnight is night. Mudnight to afternoon is morning. You can use greetings such as good morning, afternoon, evening, night, and day as appropriately designated by the times above.

10 am to 4:00 am is All day and into the next day. Is this what you meant? 10 am to noon takes the greeting, “Good morning”. 2 pm to 5 pm. “Good afternoon”. 5 pm to midnight, Good nIght” Midnight to 4 am, “Good morning” What ever possessed you to ask this?

In what language and in which country….. In English, in Australia it might be “Good day”, in a traditional UK environment it might be “Good morning” until 12:00 and “Good afternoon” after, In the US it might just be “Hi”
